casebody.data:
Thurman A. BROWN, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7356. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 16, 1934. In forma pauperis. Thurman A. Brown, of Atlanta, Ga., in pro. per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., and H. T. Nichols, Sp. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, POSTER, and SIBLEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed
